A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've been a rabid and diehard fan of Lucasfilm since I first saw \"The Empire Strikes Back\" at six years old. I am a huge admirer of the prequels. I adored the old Expanded Universe novels\, comic books and games. I was very pleased with \"The Force Awakens\". All that said... \"The Last Jedi\" is my absolute favorite STAR WARS film of all time. Rian Johnson has directed the most bold and beautiful film since 1977's \"A New Hope\". This film deserves 5 stars\, two thumbs up and 100% scores. I love this movie.
